# function: customers_config

Compute customer configurations with product and feature inheritance



## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
customers_config(customers dynamic, products dynamic, features dynamic) dynamic
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `customers` (Dynamic) Map of customer configurations
1. `products` (Dynamic) Map of product definitions
1. `features` (Dynamic) Map of feature definitions
